last_episode_to_air.name: Angels in the Night
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Gargoyles are tricked while attempting to rescue a child in a partially built building. Angela and Bronx are too late to save the rest of the clan as the sun comes up. When the police arrive they capture the still stone Angela and Bronx and put them in jail for all the 'previous crimes' the gargoyles had committed. Meanwhile, the rest of the clan wakes up in Xanatos's care. Xanatos had staged their 'destruction' so the Quarrymen would leave them alone. The clan goes to rescue Angela, who is being transported by train. The Quarrymen attack and the Gargoyles save all the train's passengers, and are immediately accepted by everyone.

name: Gargoyles
overview: In Scotland, 994 A.D. Goliath and his clan of gargoyles defend a medieval castle. In present day, David Xanatos buys the castle and moves it to New York City. When the castle is attacked the gargoyles are awakened from a 1000 year curse.

episodes.name: Awakening, Part One
episodes.overview: In 994, a band of Vikings attack castle Wyvern in Scotland, but are driven back by the gargoyles protecting it. While retreating, they wow revenge... and someone in the castle may just want to help them with that.

episodes.name: Awakening, Part Two
episodes.overview: Goliath returns to the castle to find all but a handful of his clan destroyed, and the humans abducted. The gargoyles defeat the Vikings and rescue the captives, but a tragic misunderstanding leaves them cursed to remain stone statues day and night... until a rich 20th century businessman takes an interest in them.

episodes.name: Awakening, Part Three
episodes.overview: Not satisfied with Xanatos's explanation, detective Maza decides to take a look around the castle by herself. Xanatos wants the Gargoyles help in retrieving the stolen data.

episodes.name: Awakening, Part Four
episodes.overview: Elisa and Goliath are ambushed in the park by a group of commandos. They try to escape, but dawn comes and Goliath turns to stone, leaving Elisa having to lead the pursuers away alone. Upon Goliath's return to the castle, Xanatos reunites him with and old 'friend'. The Gargoyles accept to help Xanatos retrieve his stolen disks from Cyberbiotics.

episodes.name: Awakening, Part Five
episodes.overview: The Gargoyles attack the data storage facilities, and when they return successful, Xanatos decides they've outlived their usefulness.

episodes.name: Thrill of the Hunt
episodes.overview: A group of TV show fighters called The Pack appears and seems more than a match for all of the gargoyles.

episodes.name: Temptation
episodes.overview: Demona convinces Brooklyn that humans and gargoyles can never live together, and asks him to help her show Goliath the same.

episodes.name: Deadly Force
episodes.overview: Broadway accidentally shoots Elisa with her gun. Wrecked by regret, he takes her to the hospital and then goes off on his own to take his frustration out on an criminal he can find. When the others hear, they assume it was the work of a gangster Elisa was investigating, and set out to take him down - permanently.

episodes.name: Enter MacBeth
episodes.overview: As Xanatos is about to get out of prison, he wonders what to do about the Gargoyles. As luck would have it, he is contacted by a stranger calling himself MacBeth who offers to take the creatures off his hands.

episodes.name: The Edge
episodes.overview: Xanatos donates jewel of his - the Eye of Odin - to the city's museum. Then he has one of his robot gargoyles steal it back, framing Goliath.

episodes.name: Long Way to Morning
episodes.overview: Demona forces Goliath into a confrontation, wounding him badly and leaving Hudson having to protect him until dawn... A situation that reminds the old gargoyle of a mission he led over a millennia ago to recover a book of spells from the Archmage necessary to save the poisoned Prince.

episodes.name: Her Brother's Keeper
episodes.overview: Xanatos offers Elisa's brother a job as pilot and bodyguard, and he certainly gets his moneys worth when Jackal and Hyena are ordered to assassinate him.

episodes.name: Reawakening
episodes.overview: Concluding that science or sorcery alone are not enough to stop the gargoyles, Demona and Xanatos try combine the two, rebuilding a gargoyle from the rubble left at the castle and filling out the rest with cybernetics.

episodes.name: Leader of the Pack
episodes.overview: A mysterious masked man, who calls himself Coyote, breaks the Pack out of prison. He appoints himself leader and all together set a trap for the gargoyles. Lexington's anger towards the Pack blinds his judgment and puts himself and the clan at risk.

episodes.name: Metamorphosis
episodes.overview: Someone is taking people off the street and turning them into gargoyle-like creatures. Unsurprisingly, the trail leads to leads to one of Xanatos's labs.

episodes.name: Legion
episodes.overview: Coldstone reawakens, but damage to machine in head leaves him completely confused and unable to control his actions.

episodes.name: A Lighthouse in the Sea of Time
episodes.overview: An archeological dig uncovers a set of scrolls, believed to contain Merlin's spells. Macbeth sends his mercenaries to try to capture the scrolls, but the gargoyles manage to stop them, getting separated from Hudson and Broadway in the process, both having one of the two scroll containers.

episodes.name: The Mirror
episodes.overview: Demona steels a magical mirror to summon an elf named Puck, and forces him use his magic against Goliath and the humans. The result is however not quite what she had in mind...

episodes.name: The Silver Falcon
episodes.overview: Matt disappears while looking into his pet obsession - the Illuminati, and Broadway insist in tagging along when Elisa investigates.

episodes.name: Eye of the Beholder
episodes.overview: Xanatos proposes to Fox, giving her the Eye of Odin as an engagement present. Soon afterwards, a huge wolf-like humanoid starts appearing throughout the city, devastating everything in it's path while looking for food.

episodes.name: Vows
episodes.overview: Xanatos and Fox are getting married, and the groom asks Goliath to be his best man. Unsurprisingly, it turns out to be another of Xanatos's schemes, this time to obtain an piece of an artifact Goliath has - the Phoenix Gate, capable of opening doorways trough time.

episodes.name: City of Stone, Part One
episodes.overview: While Demona prepares to cast a spell on the entire city through a pirate TV broadcast, she remembers her life after Goliath and the others had been turned to stone by the Magus.

episodes.name: City of Stone, Part Two
episodes.overview: The gargoyles awaken to find nearly all of the inhabitants of New York turned to stone. Nearly a thousand years before, a young man named MacBeth must decide how much he's willing to sacrifice for love.

episodes.name: City of Stone, Part Three
episodes.overview: While Xanatos works on breaking the spell, the story of MacBeth continues, as the lord is forced to take up arms against his brother, the King, when the Weird Sisters prophesies his ascension to the throne of Scotland.

episodes.name: City of Stone, Part Four
episodes.overview: The plan to end the spell is sent into motion, but Demona make preparations to stop it. In the past, MacBeth must decide if his alliance with the gargoyles is worth a war with England.

episodes.name: High Noon
episodes.overview: MacBeth and Demona are working together; they steal Coldstone and use him as bait to lure the gargoyles into a trap. Elisa is to face Demona by herself and save the clan.

episodes.name: Outfoxed
episodes.overview: Cyberbiotics launches a new air fortress, and suspecting Xanatos might try something, Goliath follows it closely. But the owner is waiting for him, wanting revenge for the destruction of the previous craft.

episodes.name: The Price
episodes.overview: MacBeth throws a magic powder at Hudson, and the next night the old gargoyle remains stone while the others wake up...

episodes.name: Revelations
episodes.overview: Matt's investigations bring him in contact with the Illuminati, and he is offered membership... If he can get them a gargoyle.

episodes.name: Double Jeopardy
episodes.overview: A new gargoyle appears out of nowhere... He sounds like Goliath... he looks like Goliath... and he tries to force Elisa's car off the road...

episodes.name: Upgrade
episodes.overview: After the Pack is beaten by the gargoyles for the umpteenth time, Xanatos offers them new and improved cybernetic / gene-spliced bodies.

episodes.name: Protection
episodes.overview: Dracon is surprised to find someone encroaching on his protection racket... a cop - Elisa Maza.

episodes.name: The Cage
episodes.overview: The Mutates, burning for revenge against the clan, return while Goliath decides to strong measures to find a cure for them with the unwilling aid of Dr. Sevarius.

episodes.name: Avalon, Part 1
episodes.overview: Tommy, the boy Goliath and his clan befriended 1000 years ago arrives in Manhattan. He needs help in Avalon. Goliath Elisa, and Bronx go with him to help and see find out what happened to the Gargoyle eggs.

episodes.name: Avalon, Part 2
episodes.overview: Goliath, Elisa meet with Katherine, and the Mage. They're under attack from the Archmage, Demona, MacBeth, and 3 of Auberon's children. Elisa knows they'll need more allies in the up coming fight. She goes to wake a human whose been on the island for a long time.

episodes.name: Avalon, Part 3
episodes.overview: With the Archmage's millennia spanning plot nearing completion, Goliath decides they must try to recapture one of the items that give the magician his power. Meanwhile, Elisa and the Magus investigate the legend of the sleeping King - Arthur Pendragon.

episodes.name: Shadows of the Past
episodes.overview: The magic of Avalon sends the company back to castle Wyvern, where something starts to twist Goliath's perception of reality, reminding him of painful old memories.

episodes.name: Heritage
episodes.overview: Some of Oberon's Children live in the human world, but they are forbidden to interfere directly in the affairs of humans.    Angela seems very intelligent and observant, while Goliath leaps before he looks.

episodes.name: Monsters
episodes.overview: Trying to find Manhattan again through Avalon's magic, they end up on Loch Ness, where Sevarius is trying to capture the famous monster for his experiments.

episodes.name: Golem
episodes.overview: Goliath and the others find themselves in Prague, where a rabbi is trying to reawaken the golem to protect the citizens against organized crime.

episodes.name: Sanctuary
episodes.overview: In Paris, the company comes across Demona, Thailog and MacBeth, all deep in a triangle of treachery.

episodes.name: M.I.A.
episodes.overview: Sent to London, Goliath comes in contact with the remnants of a local gargoyle clan, and is accused of leading one of their members to his death - 40 years before.

episodes.name: Grief
episodes.overview: In Egypt, they find the Pack working on another of Xanatos's schemes - trying to pry immortality out of the god of death's hands.

episodes.name: Kingdom
episodes.overview: Worried about Elisa and Goliath, the remaining gargoyles look around for clues to their whereabouts. Brooklyn starts by contacting Talon, and finds a power struggle developing among the mutants.

episodes.name: The Hound of Ulster
episodes.overview: In Ireland, Goliath, Elisa and Angela find themselves trapped by the Banshee, who believes they're agents of Oberon come to take her back to Avalon.

episodes.name: Walkabout
episodes.overview: The World Tourists team up with Dingo and Fox to stop an artificially intelligent machine mass undergoing a grey goo situation.

episodes.name: Mark of the Panther
episodes.overview: Humans turning into panthers (or panthers turning into humans), poachers, and Elisa's mother await the company as they arrive in Nigeria.

episodes.name: Pendragon
episodes.overview: Seeking out Excalibur in London, Arthur meets Griff, and together they're sent to Manhattan by the Stone of Destiny where the sword is said to lie. Unfortunately, MacBeth is about, having sensed that powerful magic is gathering...

episodes.name: Eye of the Storm
episodes.overview: In Norway, the company is met by a mysterious one-eyed man who wants the Eye of Odin. When Goliath refuses to give it to him, he says they will regret it... especially Elisa who isn't dressed for the cold.

episodes.name: The New Olympians
episodes.overview: In the middle of nowhere, Goliath and co. find the hidden city of New Olympus, where the creatures of Greek myth have retreated, and humans are outlawed.

episodes.name: The Green
episodes.overview: Cyberbiotics are cutting down the rainforest in Guatemala, and have hired Jackal and Hyena to take care of the local Gargoyle clan.

episodes.name: Sentinel
episodes.overview: Arriving on Easter Island, Elisa is hit by taken by a strange being. When she is found again, she has no memories of herself... or the gargoyles.

episodes.name: Bushido
episodes.overview: Gargoyles and humans have lived in peace in a Japanese village for centuries, but a businessman plans to exploit that trust for financial gain.

episodes.name: Cloud Fathers
episodes.overview: Xanatos is buying up Native American land, and Elisa's father and sister decide to find out what he plans to do with it.

episodes.name: Ill Met By Moonlight
episodes.overview: The company hopes for some rest when they find themselves returning to Avalon. But the peace short lived, as Oberon appears, demanding that the humans and gargoyles leave the island to make way for the return of his children.

episodes.name: Future Tense
episodes.overview: Luck seems upon the company, as they spot the statue of liberty through the mists. But the New York the see is not the one they left... It is a devastated ruin controlled by Xanatos's robot sentries.

episodes.name: The Gathering, Part One
episodes.overview: Oberon has gathered his children... save for one. Puck remains somewhere in the mortal realm, and Oberon takes a gargoyle hound to Manhattan to track him down. Meanwhile, Xanatos's and Fox's families have their own gathering, as Fox has given birth.

episodes.name: The Gathering, Part Two
episodes.overview: Oberon besieges Xanatos's skyscraper, determined to let nothing stand between him and the child.

episodes.name: Vendettas
episodes.overview: Three vengeful souls seek to make the gargoyles pay for ruining their lives.

episodes.name: Turf
episodes.overview: Tomas Brod tries to establish himself in New York by throwing out Dracon. Having infiltrated his gang, Elisa ends up right in the middle.

episodes.name: The Reckoning
episodes.overview: When the Manhattan Clan captures Demona, they and the Mutates decide to be her permanent jailers, unaware that they are falling into an elaborate trap.

episodes.name: Possession
episodes.overview: Puck's first magic lesson for Alexander causes no end of confusion amongst the gargoyles, as the two transfer two of Coldstone's personalities into Broadway and Angela, while possessing two other gargoyles themselves.

episodes.name: Hunter's Moon, Part 1
episodes.overview: Elisa is transferred to the night shift and given a new partner. Demona is stealing large quantities of a powerful disinfectant from Xanatos. And there's a new hunter in town, out to make sure every last gargoyle is dead...

episodes.name: Hunter's Moon, Part 2
episodes.overview: Goliath swears revenge against to Hunters for what they did to Angela, and flies out to take the battle to them.

episodes.name: Hunter's Moon: Part 3
episodes.overview: After learning that the Clan survived the destruction of the clock tower, the Hunters expose their existence to the public while Demona prepares her masterplan to exterminate humanity.

episodes.name: The Journey
episodes.overview: With the existence of the Gargoyles revealed to the world, a hate group calling themselves ""The Quarrymen"" emerges determined to wipe them all out.

episodes.name: Ransom
episodes.overview: Alex Xanatos is abducted, and the kidnappers demand a gargoyle as ransom.

episodes.name: Runaways
episodes.overview: As Brooklyn feels put aside by the clan, he makes friends with a group of young runaways. Goliath and Eliza go out and search for him.

episodes.name: Broadway Goes Hollywood
episodes.overview: Fox decides to make a movie, thinking it will help the Gargoyles' acceptance among humanity. She and Broadway go to Hollywood. Jackal and Hyena threat to ruin their plans.

episodes.name: A Bronx Tail
episodes.overview: Bronx accidentally winds up in Pennsylvania by train and his one friend is an Amish boy. He is spotted and hunted down by frightened residents. The boy hides his new friend, and then tries to send him back to New York after sundown.

episodes.name: The Dying of the Light
episodes.overview: The Quarrymen attack a group trying to promote tolerance between humans and gargoyles. Hudson starts to have problems with his vision.

episodes.name: And Justice for All
episodes.overview: The gargoyles try to stop a jewel store burglary, but the gargoyles end up the main suspects when the thieves escape. When the police capture Goliath, he asks the others not to break him out, confident that the justice system will find him innocent.

episodes.name: Genesis Undone
episodes.overview: The Clone Clan are deteriorating. Goliath must decide whether to work together with Sevarius or to leave them to die.

episodes.name: Generations
episodes.overview: Angela still believes that Demona can be redeemed. The Clan, particularly Goliath and Brooklyn, try to convince her that her mother will never change. But in the end Angela touches Demona in a way that neither of them will ever know.

episodes.name: ...For It May Come True
episodes.overview: After being knocked out in a battle with the Quarrymen, Goliath dreams that he is a human married to Elisa, in a world where gargoyles are unknown.

episodes.name: To Serve Mankind
episodes.overview: Goliath is brainwashed by the Illuminati, and sent out to kill a visiting European president.

episodes.name: Seeing Isn't Believing
episodes.overview: Proteus has escaped New Olympus and come to New York, followed by Taurus. He takes on various shapes to pit Elisa and Goliath against each other.

episodes.name: Angels in the Night
episodes.overview: The Gargoyles are tricked while attempting to rescue a child in a partially built building. Angela and Bronx are too late to save the rest of the clan as the sun comes up. When the police arrive they capture the still stone Angela and Bronx and put them in jail for all the 'previous crimes' the gargoyles had committed. Meanwhile, the rest of the clan wakes up in Xanatos's care. Xanatos had staged their 'destruction' so the Quarrymen would leave them alone. The clan goes to rescue Angela, who is being transported by train. The Quarrymen attack and the Gargoyles save all the train's passengers, and are immediately accepted by everyone.
